mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, wechat_id, nick_name, native_place, current_location, gender, date_format(birth_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as birth_date, blood_type, height, weight, education, house, job_info, interest, marriage_status, family, target, declaration, user_status
mapper.select: select image_path from user_image where user_id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into marriage_user (user_name, wechat_id, nick_name, native_place, current_location, gender, birth_date, blood_type, height, weight, education, house, job_info, interest, marriage_status, family, target, declaration, user_status) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weChatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{height,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{weight,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{education,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{house,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{jobInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{declaration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.update: update marriage_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_id = #{weChatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_location = #{currentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, height = #{height,jdbcType=TINYINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=TINYINT}, education = #{education,jdbcType=TINYINT}, house = #{house,jdbcType=TINYINT}, job_info = #{jobInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest = #{interest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage_status = #{marriageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, family = #{family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, declaration = #{declaration,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
